hero.title: Our Story ‚Äì From First Hi to Forever
hero.subtitle: Every memory with you is my favorite chapter.

story.title: The Day Everything Changed
story.text: manam first new seminar hall loo kallisam .....manam journey akkada start ayyeindhi naku ninu first chudaganne aslaa nuvu nenu close avvtham annukoledhu .....manam oka friends laa start start ayyeindhi.....inka alaa manam journey loo chalaa close ayyam okari okaru relationship looki vacham manam unna almost 6 months lonne chala ante chalaa happy gaa unnam inka illane yenni situation vaachinaa naa nuvu undali ani korukuntunaa .....bangaram nuvu naa thoo unte theliyani happiness entha alaa ante payyeki cheppalenu kani chalaa istame nuvu ante chalaa baa chuskunta neyy naaa bujii bangaram

timeline.title: First selfie
timeline.description: manam idharam first outreach appudu kallisi theeskuna snap ....neku gurthu undhaa selfie theeskundhama ani addigav.....ahh rojuu chalaa baga anipinchindhii nee thoo kani appudu kuda nee thone unna starting ayyeina ahh day naku chala baga nachindhii

timeline.title: First time temple
timeline.description: Mannam idharam first time temple ki vellinappudu photo ahh roju asla mannam idhariki feeling start ayyeina roju mannam ahh aslaa idharam veltham annukoledhu ......kani ahh tym idharam vellam chalaa rojulu tharwatha nee thoo gudiki vachaa ahh rojuu.......

timeline.title: First outing
timeline.description: Mannam idharam first bhayyataku vellani appudu krishna barrage dhagraa neeku propose chesa ahh roju manam oka 2hr 30mins akkade unnam idharam ninu first time akkade huge chuskuna krishna barrage dhagraa .....

timeline.title: Lifelong memory
timeline.description: Manam first time idharam entha gannoo wait chesina trip mumbai edhi aeithey life long gurthu undi pooye memory aslaa manam first mumbai loo theeskuna photo edhi .....

timeline.title: Future goal
timeline.description: Manna favourite and manna future dream ee photo ....elanti photo theeskunam ante nuvey main reason ah roju nuvu kani naa pakkaki vachee undakapooye unte elanti photo undidhey kadhu .....kani neeku korikaa oka buddodu kavali ani ee photo aeithey yeppudu chala saaruluu open cheskuna ninu miss ayyeina prathisari ee photo chuskunta nuvu gurthu vachinaa prathi sari first open chesina photo edhi mannam mumbai trip ki ee oka memory

letter.title: My Bangaram......
letter.text: Bangaram nee thoo life long undali ani undhi naku endhuko thelidhuu kani nee tho unte baguntadhi chalaa happy gaa anipistadhii malli mana pathaa lfy manaki ravvali nuvu malli naa dhagraku raavali ani annukuntuna kani baa chuskuntane naa thoo unnappudu nuvu ela unnavo Thelidhu nenu yedhii korrukunano anni nee dhagraa doorikindhi motham happiness, emotion .....inka cheppukuntu pothe nuvu ante chala istame nenu neeku em chesina special gaa undali annukunta ninu oka chinna pilla laa chuskunna entha anna nuvu penchukune pennpudu kukka nee kadha jagrata gaa chuskuntavaa bangaram ü´∂ü§åü•π

future.title: To Be Continued...
future.intro: Our story is just beginning. I have a little secret for you.
future.secretTitle: Only nee kosame e video bangaram
future.secretMessage:
Whenever you feel lonely, just remember that you are always in my heart. Distance means so little when someone means so much. Call me, text me, I'm always here for you.

I Love You!
